content.detailedDescription:
I do have sleep paralysis.  but on night was different from the normal sleep paralysis that i'm used it.
i was lying on my stomache almost asleep.  i could hear my mom and her boyfriend watching tv in another room.  then all of the sudden i was paralyzed.  in my normal sleep paralysis i can feel the sensation coming on and deal with it, in this case, it was instant.  i couldn't move and my face was in the pillow so i couldn't see anything.  
however i remember hearing the drill and feeling it going into a certain point on my neck, almost right underneath the skull.  after the drill was removed i was able to move and immediately checked myself, but there was nothing around me and there was no scar but i could still feel it.

still to this day, the exact spot where the drill went into my neck, i get a little twinge or cramp.
content.summary: Given implant

content.detailedDescription: Heard loud screetch then object flew overhead very fast. object was low to ground 500ft or so. faint pulsating lights on rear of craft. almost appeared to fly on its side, then craft vanished
content.summary: Fast low flying object

content.detailedDescription: Monday morning 10-27-14 approx between 7:00 and 8:00 a.M. headed east on i-75 about halfway between naples and ft lauderdale. there were zero clouds in the sky. the sun was rising and still low on the horizon. i observed, well above and slightly to the right of the sun (and appeared to be about rocket height), some sort of an aircraft`traveling straight up with two thick airstreams beneath it; only it didn't look like it was moving. it just hung there and never changed direction, shape or location; like it was a permanent fixture. as i headed east, the roof of my auto eventually blocked my vision of it and i didn't pursue it any further. i just surmised that there was a cape canaveral rocket launch that i hadn't heard about, however, i was unable to find any information about a rocket launch on that morning.
content.summary: Looked like an object traveling straight up with two thick trails underneath, only suspending and not moving.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were outside my condominium walking to my car
in the back parking lot i saw a flash in the sky, not sure if it was a plane.
it was not blinking so i decided to take a few pictures, the one i attached turned out best.
i sent it to a ufo sighting site and they confirmed that it could indeed be an alien aircraft.
it went into a straight line from nw to sw and then disappeared into the night.
content.summary: It hovered in the sky for a few moments then went into a straight line and disappeared, it was glowing

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the i-85 n at about 3am, heading to breakfast with a friend.  we were having a conversation; laughing and talking, when suddenly i saw a huge bright white lighted object in the sky traveling in the same direction in which i was driving.  it flew forward in a straight line just ahead of us then disappeared!  it was a square or slightly rectangular shape and the light was extremely bright.  my friend yelled out "did you see that?!"  as her eyes filled with tears and i confirmed that i did.  she then asked what it was and if i thought it was a shooting star. she began to pray. i told her this could not have been a shooting star for a few reasons.  first, it was far too bright. second, it was too low in the sky.  and last, because they do not move as fast as this object did.  what we saw accelerated at what seemed to be the speed of light then disappeared in about 2 seconds.  it happened to quickly to capture a picture, however i know what i saw and i'm glad someone else witnessed this intriguing event.
content.summary: Ufo sighting on i-85 in atlanta, ga

content.detailedDescription:
Two star / satellite - like objects moved and flashed in tandem, emitted beam between them.  they were the brightest objects in the sky, brighter than a planet.  one started flashing, stationary, then another lit up and flashed in perfect sync with the other.  they were near to each other, like a constellation.  they flashed in sync as they moved, so as to coordinate themselves in position.  then they lined up with each other, remained stationary and blinked in tandem at a constant rate.

then one emitted a beam of what appeared to be white visible light to the other.  this continued for some time, about 5 minutes.  i went inside to get my camera.  fumbled around with it (canon 60d) and could not get the dagum aperature to go wide enough to see in the nightsky.  i kept looking up to see if they were still there.  they continued for about a total of 8 minutes and then disappeared.

they were approximately 20-30 degrees in altitude from the top of a nearby faa beacon tower facility that is clearly visible from my cabin, about 1 mile away. 

when i first saw this phenomenon, i thought it was related to the towers, maybe a newly activated tower, except much higher.  then the 'stars' moved, then i knew there was something very strange going on.

it appeared as though these two stars were communicating via the beam.
content.summary: Two star / satellite - like objects moved and flashed in tandem, emitted beam between them

content.detailedDescription:
I was observing orion constellation (the three kings) around 4:30 am ist,  i noticed a bright star just below the three kings in ne direction and then suddenly near & below the star i saw a big flash, initially i thought that it might be another star which is emitting light but it was a big flash near the star just like you switch a big blub on and off within sec's, then after few sec the object appeared in the sky, to my naked eye it appeared like a distant small star suddenly it started moving, it started moving towards e within 25 sec or so it disappeared, then reappeared after some time about 15-20 min and this time it changed its course and went towards ne position from that star and again after some time within 25 sec it disappeared from the night sky.  

what ever that was it was not near to the earths surface but some where deep in the sky because the object appeared small and initially gave me a impression of a star.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Initially it was star like then flash appered in the night sky and then it started moving towards e within 25 sec it disappered, then reappered after some time this time changed its course and went towards ne and again after some time it disappered.

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home i notice four reddish/orange lights positioned in the shape of arch just hovering. this lasted about a minute then they beginning moving in the same direction. lost sight of them due to the trees blocking my view. i have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: 4 ufo's in winder ga

content.detailedDescription:
Similar to case #61015. my husband and i took a walk out into the cow field down the street to see antaries rocket launch. just heard the mission had been delayed till tonight and blew up upon clearing the launch pad.
at about 6:45 we saw a bright light in the sky, larger than any star or plane. it first appeared at the horizon and climbed. we also remarked on how slow it was going, straight up, then started arcing to the left. thinking it was starting to get into the orbit of the earth. after maybe 10- 12 minutes, we thought we saw enough and started home.

the light was bright and cylindrical (longer than wide). the brightness remained constant. there was a cloud in the near distance (maybe over the next town) and we were surprised when we could see the "antaries rocket" through the cloud as it was climbing.
what did we see if it wasn't antaries?
content.summary: Similar to case #61015. out in cowfield down the street to see antaries rocket launch with my husband. 10/28/14  between 6:30 and 7 pm found out the mission had been delayed till tonight and blew up upon clearing the launch pad.

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance and i were on our way home from guadalupe state beach. the gate closed at 6:30 pm and iit was 6:20ish at the time we decided to leave. while driving north on highway 1, we noticed a bright light traveling from east to west at a high rate of speed. we did not think it was an airplane for it was too high in altitude. 

as we watched, the object flew in a straight line . as we kept watching it for about 20 seconds, the object dimmed and then completely disappeared in front of our eyes.
content.summary: Bright light going straight then fluttered and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: We were driving south on i 65 we just entered into kentucky we followed the bend in the road by a hospital it is close to exit 137. we saw a green ball of light descend down then it was gone it didn't fade out it just disappeared like someone flipped a switch. it had a yellow green tail. while the orb was more of a blue green. it was moving at a high rate of speed. faster then a normal commercial jet. i would say looking through the windshield of the car it was about the size half dollar (from orb to tail)if you would hold it up to it.It covered about 6 in my viewing range in about 4 or 5 seconds before dissappearing. it made no sounds that we could hear. we did not see anything breaking off from it. i have seen a meteorite brake up it was not as brite as that was.  nor did it behave as one. it was a straight line as it descended then it was gone. it did not dissappear behind a bulding or a tree. the sky was clear.
content.summary: Driving south on i 65 after exit 137 where it turns saw a green ball of light descend the dissappear.

content.detailedDescription: I was taken by at least two entities. i think they were wearing suits that were of a rouge red in color. one was taller than the other, slender with longer arms than we have. they came back a few times to at least four different homes over a period of years. my german shepherd bit one of them at the time of the second occurence. i was taken into a saucer and was subject to surgery. i didn't know about the surgery until years later when i was at the drs. office having an exam. the doctor asked my mom who had done the surgery on me and mom said i had not had any surgery. they made me forget most of the abduction but i do remember that we were following a car on a mountain road that first night they took me. i was told telepathically that i would be okay then they took me home. i'm pretty sure they had taken my grandmother also. at the second time my mother was held frozen in place at the top of the stairs and her hair was standing out from her head like static electricity. she was yelling for my grandmother to help her. she couldn't move for a few minutes. last contact was in 2008 in my home in florida. they did some sort of scanning of my body. it made me feel euphoric.
content.summary: I was in front yard and saw a saucer above me hovering. it then landed and they surrounded my house and took me. i was gone from 12pm until 10pm. they did surgery on me.

content.detailedDescription:
On evening of tuesday sept. 30, 2014 at approx. 10:30pm. e.S.T. i went outside to take my garbage to the road, & i looked up in the sky to see if the moon was out as it was the night before. as i scanned the sky was cloudy and in the southeast approx. 500 to 600 feet above the trees across the street i could see what appeared to be the round glow of the moon from behind the clouds, at first i didn't notice the wedge or triangular shaped "shadow" that pointed upward from the bottom of the round misty glow. this was definitely weird & i was definitely intrigued by it. after seeing the "wedge" i went inside my home & got my camera. i photographed & watched the object for approx. 1 hour straight, and it remained still.  from my photos i am not sure, but it appears to have changed colors, anyway, at this point i emailed my photos to wood-tv 8 weather to report it as a possible weather or lunar anomaly, and to this day never received a response. i continued to check on & photograph the light from 11:35pm to 2:00am approx. every 20 min. (as i expected the light to move in the sky as the moon would) & the wedge & glowing light remained stationary in the southwest sky until i retired to bed.

there are no churches, housing developments or construction sites to the sw of me and actually lake michigan is approx. 400 yards directly west of where the light appeared. i have 26 photos of the object.  on october 1 the moon did appear in the same area but it progressively moved northward across the horizon progressively throughout the evening. i do not believe what i saw was the moon, as it too would have moved across the evening sky.  i have not seen anything like it in the sky since.
content.summary: Observed glowing light with triangular/wedge

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i actively watch the stars at night. last night we saw two massive stars (the size of venus) way up in space silently moving as if connected, (one giant craft) in slow motion and complete silence. they came  from a southwestern direction flying right over our heads and then turning above us in a huge loop and returning to a northwester direction, flying slowly away.  we observed them through binoculars. they looked similar to fast walkers but much bigger lights and moved in slow motion, the two massive lights seemingly connected. we could not see the object(if there was one) in between the two lights, only the lights on each end which were identical to each other, appearing as two massive stars the brightest in the sky moving so slowly you would have to be watching them closely to notice that they were actually moving at all. a wonderful sighting!
content.summary: Two massive stars way up in space silently moved in a circular pattern over our heads as we observed them with binoculars

content.detailedDescription: Me and a good friend of mine were sitting outside smoking when i had he urge i look up into the night sky. i noticed a red light coming towards us which turned out to be a military helicopter. that struck me as odd then out of no where there red light appeared in the sky in the field across from my house. i ran inside to grab a few people so they could see it as well. we all watched in amazement as this very huge triangle shaped object with there red lights went from right to left very casually this craft also add no sound at all. after watching it for about 10-15 minutes it disappeared over some trees. immediately following it disappearing behind the trees we all saw yet another military helicopter fly right over us with a spotlight in looking for setting in the sky.
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo being followed by military helicopters

content.detailedDescription: I was prepared to watch the antares launch from wallops island from a friends farm in gamber, md.  i carefully mapped out the exact location on the horizon to look for the launch that was expected on the night of the 27th at 6.45p local time.  i arrived at the location about 10 minutes early and met up with a few friends, my wife and my 15y/o son.  according to the nasa.Gov website the rocket should be visible abou 40 second after liftoff in my area...But about one minute before at 6.44p we noticed a bright yellow-oragne fireball...Ascending muchin the same way a rocket would launch it ascended for about on minute then quickly dimmed much like the mco of any rocket stage...Barely visible during the last 10 seconds then it was no longer visible.  to gauge my exact location if you plot three points on a map (bwi airport, annapolis, md and cambridge, md) extend the straight line to the southeast to wallops island  then extend nw 25.2 miles from bwi the fartherest nw point is my viewing location.  to gauge elevation it is best described by extending your arm fully and holding a business card long ways up/down the is approx the elevation change at 138 miles above the horizon.  keep in mind that many of us saw this and it wasnt until hours later i was told it was scrubbed...We were all convinced we witnessed the launch...Please let me know if you have anymore questions or have any idea what this could have been
content.summary: Similar to rocket launch

content.detailedDescription: See above.
content.summary: Very bright object observed by 7 adultss moving across sky from nw toward se.  passed directly overhead, no sound at all.  when in se sky started to acceleratel and ascended at apx. 70 degree angle.  turned pinkish-red color, gone in 2 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Driving through downtown bridgeport between 8 and 9 pm on october 27th 2014 when noticed a ufo like object hovering over the bridgeport fire dept. or slightly behind it, the object was grey in color triangle shaped and had 3 lights closest to each tip the lights were white. it appeared to be larger then a golfball but smaller than a basketball. it then flew off and headed towards the grafton wv area. radio in car was on so were not able to hear any sounds.
content.summary: Ufo spotted in bridgeport wv 10/27/14

content.detailedDescription: I was out taking photos of the sun setting through trees weed excetera. when reviewing my photos later i noticed a strange object in one photograph i have no idea if it is a ufo or some kind of crazy lens flare or what so i am hoping you will examine and inform me. i am attaching the original photo taken with my phone samsung s3 and two crops that i made of it to see what it was.
content.summary: I was out taking pictures did not see or hear it noticed it later

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed several unusual flying objects flying almost in formation heading from north to south. some hovered around the edge of all of the movement. so much activity cant begin to explain half of what i witnessed. this continued almost nightly. probably still going on just hasn't been as many. witnessed many landed on tree tops. some remain in daytime just mostly transparent. have many many pictures and videos of these events.  have a feeling we will be witnessing more and more as i believe its their intent for more people to see them.
i believe i could have had more recordings if my husband wasn't such a skeptic. i filmed and photographed all this in secret. what i have submitted is just the tip of the iceberg so to speak.
content.summary: Was sleeping in daughters room when i noticed green lazer lights coming through blinds

content.detailedDescription: I read case # 61011 and believe i saw the same thing. that case was spotted in pa, i am in ct. like that case report, i was outside with my daughter looking for the antares rocket launch, not knowing it had been scrubbed. when i saw this light i was sure i had seen the rocket! we had been watching different planes overhead, remarking on the different sizes and lights of each plane. all of those planes flew *overhead*. this light/object came from the horizon, and arced into the sky as if "taking off". it looked like white & fire, was small to my eye, and we kept saying it was moving slower than we thought the rocket would move, only to learn later it was not the rocket. i am confident this was not a plane - specifically because we had been observing planes so closely.
content.summary: Non-airplane object, bright light, arc into sky

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gone outside to take my dog for her morning potty routine.  i live in an apartment and walked across the street.  for some unknown reason i just happened to look up as a long white cylinder object was moving side ways across the sky from north to south.  at first it looked like a cloud or chem-trail because it was white like it was picking up the city lights on the bottom like a cloud would, but it was moving way too fast and maintained its shape the entire time.  there was no noise, vapor trail or anything.

no more than thirty seconds after i happened to look up again and saw a triangle shaped object, white in front, like there previous object, but angled like a triangle. the middle section was pitch black, because it blocked out the stars as it moved.  it was moving the exact same speed, had no lights, or tangible features like windows, and was absolutely dead silent as well.

a commercial air line came in several moments later as i live in the flight path of the local airport.  these objects were at the same level as a plane coming in for a landing, but they were obviously not planes.  they moved way faster and like i said had no visible lights and made no sound.

my reaction to the objects were like, "whoa ... that's weird."  ive been seeing weird lights in the sky here recently that don't blink, they just move steady across the sky, but these had absolutely no lights and could have moved over easily without me evening knowing had i not looked up.

i have always been fascinated with this subject and have seen lights before, but this was way different.  when you see a light, that's generally all you see, but these had shape and appeared solid.

several weeks before this i also witnessed what looked like a long chem-trail moving sideways across the sky.  i only realized it was moving because when i first saw it it was on one side of the moon and then a few minutes later it was on the other side and i watched it from there.  i realize it could have been high winds moving it, but at no point did it change shape or disipate.
content.summary: Both cylinder and triangle moving rapidly across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I went into the backyard to look at stars. it was a clear night and we live in a rural area, so the stars are beautiful. it was about 7:15 p.M. and i noticed a white star that seemed to glow and become larger. it began blinking or fluttering and flashing very rapidly, like signals, and grew much larger while doing this. the white flashes were very bright and rapid, and looked more rectangular than round. this seemed to go on a few minutes, very bright and stationary. the lights seemed to form a triangle. then they broke into three pieces, with white and red lights that seemed to spin under the bright white light, went in three directions, hung there a moment, then were gone. i was transfixed, but did not go inside for a camera as i was sure it would be gone. i looked for plane lights or helicopters, but after this it was quiet. after a while i saw a plane, normal red and green lights. i don't know what this was. i often enjoy looking at the sky but i have never seen anything like this. i felt amazement but also some fear as no one here will believe me.
content.summary: Went outside to look at stars, saw glowing

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling northeast on hwy 26 (grapevine hwy) from north richland hills tx to colleyville tx.  it was around 9:00pm, i had my girlfriend and her two children.  the boy 4 years old and the girl 9 years old.  i was heading to get some wine from the liquor store for christmas dinner a few days away.  we all saw the object.

when pulling into the parking lot of goody goody liquor, in colleyville, i noticed an object to the north.  at this point the object was so close it seemed to be about 200 feet directly above my truck.  before going into the liquor store, we all got out of the truck and stared at this object for about 20 minutes.  it was moving very slowly to the northwest and seemed to be dripping what l can only describe as molten metal or plasma.  it traveled on a slow pace and in one direction for about 5 minutes until our eyes adjusted to the night.  there was very little light pollution in this area, at this time.  once our eyes adjusted we could see multiple objects, similar in shape and activity, in the distance (to the north).  i'd have to estimate that there was at least 6 -10 similar objects.  when focusing the camera on the initial sighting, the one shown in the video, the other objects eventually disappeared. (we didn't see them anymore, but we did not see them actually leave)  

the kids were frightened and the 9 year old said that she was scared.  i had to lie to her and tell her that it was probably santa claus, and that there was nothing to worry about.

continuing from about 10 minutes into the sighting, after the other objects vanished, we watched it move more into the distance, still making the same abrupt turns, going about the same speed, never stopping to hover, and still dripping the "metal".  the store was going to close soon, so i went in quickly, made my purchase, and basically ran back out to the truck where the other 3 witnesses still stood, staring at the object.  this is roughly about 20 minutes into the sighting.

after about 20 minutes, we noticed a new ball of light directly above the truck, making erratic movements and not dripping the metal as much (if at all).  it seemed roughly  200 feet above the truck.  this was the most disturbing of the sightings (not caught on film).  it was closer, more detailed, and more strange than the other sightings.  it was making movements that are obviously not of any conventional craft i'm aware of.  large, spherical shaped and emitting it's own light. it traveled slowly to the northwest, and this went on for about 10 minutes.  until, finally, my girlfriend made it known that we needed to get the kids out of there, and that it was late and they were getting freaked out.  we left, as the "craft" was still in plain sight.  (a huge regret of mine)  we never checked back with the initial sighting...

video:  you'll see in these 2 clips, the same "craft".  this will be the first sighting.  this video was taken roughly 3-5 minutes within first noticing the object.  (video 1 = 29 secs, video 2 = 10 secs) keep in mind...The abrupt motion in the first video is me, and not the object.  i was trying to film the other objects...You can clearly make a second object out in the first video at the bottom of the screen, about midway into the video.

i would really like to know if there are any similar sightings of this type, or sightings in the same area.  if there are any questions, i'd be happy to answer them by phone or email.  

[name removed/cms/dr]
content.summary: Sparkling ufo dripping metal, making absurd directional changes.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of oct 27th 2014 650pm while standing out front of our home in essington delaware co pa. preparing to watch the launch of the antares rocket from east coast of va. we saw what we though was the rocket coming out of the s/e sky it was coming straight up and arching over head toward the north eastern part of the sky. it traveled at a very high speed at great height miles above the earth made no noise and appeared to have a tail like rocket exhaust, it was gone and out of sight with in minutes crossed the entire sky from s/e to n/e. we thought we had just witnessed the antares rocket launch. only to later learn that the launch was postponed do to a sail boat in the area.      three pictures attached third one is zoomed in
content.summary: Object came out of the s/e at high rate of speed no sound arched over hear toward the n/e then out of sight

content.detailedDescription: Ietting my dog out .Looking up at sky.Flock of birds.Orbs of yellow lights flying in formation.Scared and shocked.It flew south until out of my sight.
content.summary: Yell0w orbs flying in formation   l

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was late around 1:00 am and my best friend and i went out for one last smoke for the night before heading to bed.  we smoke every night around 10pm and 1:00 and are aware of all the flight paths and emergency flight vehicles that pass through on a regular basis over our home.  i was the first to notice the ufo.  i must have watched it for about two minutes or so when i realized that it was not a satellite because of the speed it was going.  i pointed it out to my friend and he started to pay attention to it as well.  it was going twice as fast as the airplanes that come through to seattle/tacoma international airport but still looked like a 'star' as we called it.  it was much brighter than all the rest and very perfectly circular.  it seemed to radiate or glow and got softer on the edges.  i do struggle some with eyesight at night, so i was asking him if he was seeing exactly what i was seeing and he confirmed.  we watched it go straight, but very fast from the nw to n.  it slowed down some in speed and went behind the only cloud out that night.  it then zipped out quickly so we could see it, then immediately went back to hiding in the cloud.  it went back and forth in a matter of what seemed liked seconds to us.  it did this one more time.  we saw it race out of the cloud hiding and go back and forth 4 times.  at this point, i began to shake a little from excitement.  we did try to video with our phone, but we could not get it in the view of our phones which do need to be upgraded.  (razor slim andriod).  it then proceeded to slowly come out of the cloud hiding and move very slow, like a satellite at this point.  however we knew it was not a satellite at this point.  shortly after it came out of the cloud hiding, we saw a normal plane pass by which was probably the one red eye flight we see each night that passes by.  the plane was down lower than the ufo at this point.  the ufo had moved up even higher and now had stopped near what was a star.  it stayed stationary for about 20 minutes.  we continued to stare.  we stared so much that i stopped staring at it and we joked that 'they' needed to do their paperwork before returning home, and then suddenly it started to move again and headed east.  it was moving fast again, like it did in the very beginning.  it headed east as if it was headed to cross the snoqualmie mountain pass region.  we watched it until we couldn't see it anymore and it disappeared.  i was already a believer, but this was my first ufo sighting ever.  this also made a firm believe out of my best friend who did not believe before.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Clear skies with minimal clouds and we observed an ufo for 40 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I am being abducted i wake up n i have unexplained markings implants n i know when there coming before there coming because i have fear like i never felt before i lose time n i can't prove it i've never remembered what's happening but something is happening its not physically possible to get weird patterns markings
content.summary: I have pictures of stranger markings from aliens i'm rh- red hair my linage is from the basque people of spain i have been searching for answers but i can't remember anything i just know can't explain

content.detailedDescription: I was looking up the weather and found this cloud pattern very creepy. i thought you might be interested since there is a radio tower near the event and also some strange ranch in the middle of the field with circular patterns and grid shapes around it.
content.summary: It is a weather pattern that i observed as bizzare

content.detailedDescription: I was lying on the porch looking at the sky when i saw two white, glowing boomerang shapes moving together across the sky east to west. a few minutes later, a third one moved towards a fourth one going east to west. another went southwest to northeast, one was seen moving north to south, another moving northeast to southwest. this all occurred between 1045 - 1145 pm. the objects moved quickly at a steady speed with no noise. i could see them through the clouds and in between clouds. at first i thought it was a light beam moving across the sky but then saw the shape and the fact they were coming from different directions. all together, i saw fifteen objects.
content.summary: Fifteen white, glowing, boomerang shape with no sound moving quickly acrossthe  sky
